description: An illustration of two plastic cards used for banking (they could be bank cards, debit cards, credit cards, or charge cards), one lying atop the other. The bottom card has the magnetic strip facing up and is teal colored. The top card shows the golden chip on the left side, a logo in the top right corner (two overlapping square diamonds: the left is red, the right is blue, and the square diamond where they overlap is yellow), and several shapes on the bottom representing the card's numbers, owner's name, and expiration date.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
